scopingsheet_markdown:
```markdown
   # Scoping Sheet: HealthTrack

   | Category                                        | Requirement                                              | Status                                                                                                      |
   |-----------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
   | Application Overview                           | Application Name                                         | HealthTrack                                                                                                |
   | Application Overview                           | Production URL                                          | [Production URL](healthtrack.com)                                                                         |
   | Application Overview                           | Environment for Testing                                 | Staging Environment                                                                                       |
   | Application Overview                           | Application Type                                         | ['Web', 'API', 'Mobile']                                                                                    |
   | Authentication & Access Control                | Authentication Method                                     | Username/Password, OAuth                                                                                  |
   | Authentication & Access Control                | User Roles                                                | ['Admin', 'User']                                                                                           |
   | Authentication & Access Control                | Session Management                                        | Requirement: Session Management (Username/Password, OAuth for Authentication)                             |
   | Authentication & Access Control                | Session timeout period                                    | 1 hour                                                                                                     |
   | Input Processing                               | total_num_input_fields                                  | Number of input fields for user authentication and data processing in HealthTrack: 4                         |
   | Input Processing                               | Input Types Present                                       | Requirement: Input Types Present (Username/Password, OAuth)                                                |
   | Data Processing                               | Sensitive Data Handled                                   | ('requirement', 'Handling of personal and healthcare information')                                           |
   | Data Processing                               | Data Storage                                             | Requirement: Data Storage (AWS S3, Cloud SQL)                                                              |
   | API Details                                    | Number of Endpoints                                       | ('requirement', 'Number of APIs')                                                                          |
   | API Details                                    | Authentication Required                                   | Requirement: API requires authentication                                                                  |
   | API Details                                    | Rate Limiting                                             | API Rate Limiting (Yes)                                                                                     |
   | API Details                                    | Documentation Available                                   | ('requirement', 'API documentation available for details on WAF, IPS/IDS, Load Balancer, API Gateway')  |
   | Infrastructure                                 | Security Controls Present                               | ('requirement', 'Security controls: WAF, IPS/IDS, Load Balancer, API Gateway')                             |
   | Infrastructure                                 | Input Types Present                                       | Input Types Present: Username/Password, OAuth                                                              |
   | Business Logic                                 | Critical Functions                                        | ('requirement', 'Critical Functions - Business Logic')                                                     |
   | Security Requirements                           | Compliance Requirements                                  | 1. HIPAA, GDPR                                                                                             |
   | Security Requirements                           | Previously Conducted Testing                            | 1. Penetration testing and vulnerability assessment in the past                                              |
   | Testing Constraints                            | Time Restrictions                                        | Requirement: ('requirement', 'Testing Window'), Value: 'Business Hours Only'                               |
   | Testing Constraints                            | Testing Limitations                                      | 1. Business hours only, No production impact                                                                |
   | Deliverables                                   | Required Reports                                         | Required Report(s): Security Testing Results (for HealthTrack)                                             |
   | Deliverables                                   | Timeline                                                 | Testing Window: Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM                                                              |
   ```
